mng: arteries and veins, vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

exm.mng: lit. mountain has a connecting pulse throughout like a dragon (idiom, from fengshui); sequence of events, pedigree, cause and effects, the whys and wherefores, where sth comes from and where it goes, ins and outs
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
main artery (blood vessel), fig. main highway, arterial road
